channel.title: Stupid client error
channel.description: So I managed to get past the "press any button to continue" error but what is this i dont understand? [code]Zepsity 1809 : 0 java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.unZipFile(client.java:4971) at client.downloadcache(client.java:4912) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4707) at client.startUp(client.java:9792) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:99) at client.run(client.java:6409) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Stupid client error
item.dc:creator: @aaronchris aaronchris
item.description:
@aaronchris wrote:

So do you think there’s would be a way I could have the client download the cache from the uppit I got it from? In another post you told me you’d look at it & I have you the link so I could have to download that rar & extract it? By the way thanks for explaining this to me I can code sources pretty well but when it comes to this I get very lost but I think I may be able to do this

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid client error
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

the signlink just tells the cachedownloader where to download. the cachedownloader pretty much goes out to the site, downloads the zip file, and extracts it for you. the cache is then read to the client. So there is an order there for the errors on purpose.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid client error
item.dc:creator: @aaronchris aaronchris
item.description:
@aaronchris wrote:

Crap I’m at school on my phone >.< but I haven’t zipped anything I just dl’d the client, cache & source extracted the cache to my C: & changed the name to match in the signlink.java got the source to run & all the compilers finally got the client up but I think it has something to do with an automatic cache downloader so ill need to look for that & make the client connect straight to the cache I think instead of trying to dl it

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid client error
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

okay what’s your point? the directory has nothing to do with it. Go to the cache itself and check to see how it looks. Also, did you zip the entire folder or just the content of the folder.
